sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DLRiskValueLookUp</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This script includes holds copy of data of dl_risk_value table. 
if com.glide.data_lookup plugin is NOT installed, Application will look in to this script include for look up values.
if com.glide.data_lookup plugin is NOT installed, any new values should be added in this script include</description>
        <name>DLRiskValueLookUp</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DLRiskValueLookUp = Class.create();
DLRiskValueLookUp.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
	
	filterLookUpRecords: function(impact, probability){
		var result = {};
		var lookUpRecords = this._getLookUpRecords();
		for(var i=0; i< lookUpRecords.length; i++){
			var record =  lookUpRecords[i];
			if(record.impact == impact && record.probability == probability){
				result = record;
				break;
			}
		}
		PPMDebug.log('filterLookUpRecords result ' + JSON.stringify(result));
		return result;
	},


    _getLookUpRecords: function() {
        var lookUpRecords = this._prepareData();
        PPMDebug.log('DLRiskLookUpValues are ' + JSON.stringify(lookUpRecords));
        return lookUpRecords;
    },

    _prepareData: function() {
        var result = [];

        try {
            //light yellow
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('3', 'high', 1, 'lightyellow', '2'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('1', 'low', 3, 'lightyellow', '2'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('1', 'moderate', 2, 'lightyellow', '2'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('2', 'moderate', 2, 'lightyellow', '2'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('3', 'absolute', 1, 'lightyellow', '2'));

            //tamato
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('2', 'high', 1, 'tomato', '1'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('1', 'absolute', 1, 'tomato', '1'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('2', 'absolute', 1, 'tomato', '1'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('1', 'high', 1, 'tomato', '1'));

            //lightgreen
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('3', 'low', 3, 'lightgreen', '3'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('3', 'moderate', 2, 'lightgreen', '3'));
            result.push(this._createDLLookUpRecord('2', 'low', 3, 'lightgreen', '3'));
        } catch (e) {
            gs.log('error while preparing lookup records ' + e);
        } finally {
            return result;
        }

    },

    _createDLLookUpRecord: function(impact, probability, probabilitNumber, rankColor, riskValue) {
        var data = {};
        data.impact = impact;
        data.probability = probability;
        data.probability_number = probabilitNumber
        data.risk_rank_color = rankColor;
        data.risk_value = riskValue;

        return data;
    },


    type: 'DLRiskValueLookUp'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-03 01:45:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>86e5b697536e201016f6ddeeff7b1295</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DLRiskValueLookUp</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_86e5b697536e201016f6ddeeff7b1295</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-03 12:01:33</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
